thread.title: Kirill Petrenko to take over Berlin Philharmonic in 2019
thread.title_full: Kirill Petrenko to take over Berlin Philharmonic in 2019

title: Kirill Petrenko to take over Berlin Philharmonic in 2019
text: > Entertainment Kirill Petrenko to take over Berlin Philharmonic in 2019 FILE - In this March 6, 2014 file photo musical director Kirill Petrenko, left, and theatre manager Nikolaus Bachler of the Bavarian state opera speak during a press conference in Munich, southern Germany. Kirill Petrenko has agreed to stay on as musical director at the Bavarian State Opera beyond 2018, and is expected to divide his time between the Munich job and his future post as the Berlin Philharmonicâ€™s chief conductor. (Sven Hoppe/dpa via AP, file)
